sentences.en: A quasilinear equation is one in which the highest - order derivative appears linearly.
sentences.cn: 最高阶导数线性地出现的那种方程是准线性方程.

sentences.en: Derivative works are far more complicated.
It is interesting and enlightening to consider the derivative of a vector.
sentences.cn: 这对研究矢量的导数来说是重要的,而且富有启发性.

sentences.en: It is unscholarly and derivative, and raises a lot of unanswered questions.
sentences.cn: 它不象学者所写而且是摹仿的, 并且提出很多不能解答的问题.

sentences.en: Ozone is formed in the reaction, and a nitro derivative of the olefin.
sentences.cn: 在反应中形成臭氧及烯烃的硝基衍生物.

sentences.en: The actual compound is considered to be a derivative or the parent compound.
sentences.cn: 把实际化合物看作母体化合物的衍生物.

sentences.en: The derivative of the composite function is the product of the derivatives of the components.
sentences.cn: 复合函数的导数是构成函数的导数之积.

sentences.en: The derivative of the step is the impulse.
The difference between an ordinary and a partial derivative was at first not explicitly recongized.
sentences.cn: 通常的导数与偏导数的区别在一开始并未被人们明确地认识.

sentences.en: The name Cambridge is a derivative of the name of the River'Cam '.
sentences.cn: ‘Cambridge’这个名字是 ‘ Cam ’ 河的派生词.

sentences.en: The specification of such " derivative boundary conditions " is described in Section 3 - 5 .
sentences.cn: 这种 “ 导数边界条件 ” 的规定描述于 3-5 节中.

sentences.en: The vaccine is then mixed with saponin, a soaplike derivative from a South American tree.
sentences.cn: 然后把这种疫苗与一种皂角苷相混合.皂角苷是一种像肥皂的物质,源于南美的一种树.

sentences.en: This isn't an entirely new car, but a new derivative of the Citroen XM.
sentences.cn: 这不是一款全新的车，而是雪铁龙XM系列的派生车型。

sentences.en: This limit is sometimes called the right - hand derivative.
sentences.cn: 这个极限有时称为右导数.
